title: Suggestion/Request for the AI Bots
body:
Hi there!

As someone who often sets up custom bot games to test random things, one of the things that really annoys me is that the support bots won't take relic shield. With all the improvements you guys have made to the bots (esp the intermediate ones), I was wondering if it might be possible to code the tank support bots to take relic shield  instead of most of them taking either ancient coin or doran's shield.

Thanks!!
